summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5479 for the improvement of 60th Avenue Southwest, from West Hinds Street to a point 120 feet, more or less, south of West Spokane Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 69855, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
